channel.title: A confusing sittuation, please help! ( Turning it online)
channel.description:
Hello, I've been trying to turn my server online. I've done it about 2 years ago, I don't know how much servers have changed but here's the issue... I've portforwarded my vps, and connected the IP to the client via client.java [img]http://i43.tinypic.com/59xwmr.png[/img]
as you can see on the status checker, it's online and playable, I've even checked canyouseeme.org to check if port is open and it is
Whenever i run the server and the client, I get this message, and my friend who has tried it also gets the same message [img]http://i41.tinypic.com/2qvza6a.png[/img]

item.title: A confusing sittuation, please help! ( Turning it online)
item.dc:creator: @lost_it lost it
item.description:
@lost_it wrote:

[quote=“Arcik, post:5, topic:528179”][quote author=lost it link=topic=646929.msg4350472#msg4350472 date=1376565546]
No I’ve used other servers and client files and still the same issue
[/quote]

If you get the issue with other servers it’s most likely a problem with your computer. Have you got any applications such as uTorrent running in the background or anything which might be interfering?[/quote]

YES! FUCK YES! YOU’RE AWESOME! Getting rid of utorrent fixed the problem! thanks man!

Read full topic
item.source: A confusing sittuation, please help! ( Turning it online)

item.title: A confusing sittuation, please help! ( Turning it online)
item.dc:creator: @Java-RSPS-Noob Java-RSPS-Noob
item.description:
@Java-RSPS-Noob wrote:

  1. Make sure the firewall is ported as well
  2. You have to have the client have the vps ip if you are playing from your computer.

Read full topic
item.source: A confusing sittuation, please help! ( Turning it online)

item.title: A confusing sittuation, please help! ( Turning it online)
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

lost it:

No I’ve used other servers and client files and still the same issue

If you get the issue with other servers it’s most likely a problem with your computer. Have you got any applications such as uTorrent running in the background or anything which might be interfering?

Read full topic
item.source: A confusing sittuation, please help! ( Turning it online)

item.title: A confusing sittuation, please help! ( Turning it online)
item.dc:creator: @lost_it lost it
item.description:
@lost_it wrote:

Yambar:

First off, you don’t portforward a vps. They are already portforwarded. Trying changing your UID.

Mine wasn’t portforwarded, I had to ask the company to do it for me… I changed the UID and still getting the same problem…

Arcik:

You might be using the wrong client with the wrong server

No I’ve used other servers and client files and still the same issue

Read full topic
